title: Striking at the Heart of Darkness
header: Striking at the Heart of Darkness
abstract: An introduction to the roots of sorcery and the occult world - and what the Word of God says about it! We must have an understanding of how the enemy works through sorcery and the occult world so that we, as the Church, can strike at the heart of Evil. We must stop their prayers and influence so that a Spirit of revival will prevail!
